review: TERRIBLE! From the product to the service.  Setup was a pain it kept trying to update the freeze up. I unplugged and restarted and it was ok. Then wanted me to register a credit card before I could use it. Waited 30 min for support to remove that. Worked for about an hour then won't connect to a network.  My Chromecast plugged in next to it works just fine. Will be returning tomorrow.

review: Owned for all but 2 hours before sending back,  had major problems setting it up...wouldn't hold internet connection/kept resetting, and since from what I understand the support guy said,the remote is wifi based so I couldn't even control the menu or navigate.  When it decided to work, it would for a few seconds then stall out...like when a YouTube clip stalls out so it can load up.  Annoying.  Then the support guy suggests I switch channels on my router, which it wasn't patient enough to spend two more hours to try and figure out.  I'm sure it's great if you can get past all that though.
